messages.supportMsg: Hi there, I am having an issue with my payment option. Could I have someone take a look at order 345-937?
Hello, upon inspection it appears that you payment is being rejected because of an incorrect card number for a card ending in 3475. Please enter a valid number and the error will disappear.
Thank you, I now have it working. Have a good day.
Hey, how long would the shipping be to Los Angeles California?
Hello, the shipping time depends on your choice, which shipping method are you wishing to choose?
I'd like the standard ground shipping.
Based on the location that would arrive in 3-4 business days.
Hi, I would like to return my order 453-860, could someone please advise me in how to do so?
Hello, the returns policy and FAQ is listed in the footer of every page, this will guide you return your goods. If you have more questions I can assist you from here.
Hi, I am having trouble changing the email I have linked to my account as I no longer use that account. Could someone please assist me in this?
Hello, I was wondering what types of payment you accept?
Just a follow up on my earlier request?
I would like to return my items, order #58392. Thank you.
